thread.title: Police: Man arrested after calling 911 when girlfriend would not
thread.title_full: Police: Man arrested after calling 911 when girlfriend would not - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Dal Kalsi
title: Police: Man arrested after calling 911 when girlfriend would not
text:
SPARTANBURG, SC (FOX Carolina) - A 53-year-old Spartanburg man was arrested after he called 911 because his girlfriend would not be intimate with him, police reports state.
Police said they were called to a home on Fairfax Street just after midnight on Tuesday, where they met with Patrick Doggett, who was outside the home drinking an alcoholic beverage.
Doggett explained to police that he had called 911 because his girlfriend “would not give him any (expletive),” reports state.
Police reported that the man then turned to the house and began to yell obscenities.
Doggett was arrested and charged with public drunkenness.
Doggett was released from jail later Tuesday and is due in court on Oct. 12.
